column4: Anyone here have much experience with dual booting Ubuntu and WinXP? I'm looking at a guide now that looks pretty straightforward... just curious if there's anything "interesting" anyone has seen, or if it's mostly a breeze. :)
It's a breeze. Dunno if this is an issue for you, but it's easier if you install Windows before linux.
Then it should be a breeze. Goferit!
